item.title: Journal des Missions évangéliques, onzième année, 1836
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of the French missionary periodical 'Journal des Missions évangéliques', 11 (1836). Note: contains the 1836 map of the route to uMgungundlovu and south-eastern Africa by Thomas Arbousset, included in this digital copy between pages 320 and 321]
